title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as the value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: When using the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as the value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: The table filter should accept the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a valid value and filter the table accordingly.
SR: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column. 2. Insert a table and configure a filter based on the datetime column. 3. In the filter's value1 field, input the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')', e.g. new Date('3/2/2005').
